segments.text: Because they are too violent . Some of them are even disgusting .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Indeed there are bad games . But many of them are good .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If boys grow up with computer games , they will surely become bad .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Come on . Things are not so bad . Boys can learn to use the computer through games .
segments.speaker: S2
